alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 02 at 2:40PM EDT until May 03 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches mainly above 2500 feet. * WHERE...Garrett County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of heavy wet snow, strong winds, and green up on trees will enhance the threat for downed trees and power outages above 3,000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
